projects.title: Infinity Converter v1
projects.description: A currency converter for quick view and comparison of live current & historical exchange rates between all globally recognized currencies and commodities.

projects.title: TailorMobile (+Android App)
projects.description: TailorMobile is a digital record-keeping solution designed for tailors to easily save and access their customers' measurement information on their phones.

projects.title: pBlog
projects.description: pBlog meaning public blog is an open and signless public discretionary blogging platform for adding or updating publicly maintained short or long write-ups pertaining to any topic.

projects.title: Vuejs with localStorage dynamically
projects.description: An implementation of the usage of localStorage as a server-less database with vuejs, using vue options API. Example implemented on a 'people list app.'

projects.title: Students & Result Management System, 2017
projects.description: A large application that saves a lot of time by computerizing the tasks that occur in student data and result processing far more faster and easier. Made for a school in 2017.

projects.title: Infinity Converter v2
projects.description: A currency converter for quick view and comparison of live current & historical exchange rates between all globally recognized currencies and commodities.

projects.title: SpaceX Launches
projects.description: SpaceX Launches is an app that allows users to keep track of current, upcoming, and previous SpaceX launches, rockets, and corporate information.

projects.title: Remotech
projects.description: Remotech is a comprehensive job listing and search application that provides a fast and modern user experience for both job employers and work searchers.

projects.title: UpNote
projects.description: UpNote is an effective and intuitive cloud-based note-taking tool with a great user experience for writing down ideas, taking quick notes or keeping a journal at any time, synced across multiple devices.
